segment.source: Setup worksheet (Surface Hub)
segment.target: Setup worksheet (Surface Hub)

segment.source: When you've finished pre-setup and are ready to start first-time setup for your Microsoft Surface Hub, make sure you have all the information listed in this section.
segment.target: When you've finished pre-setup and are ready to start first-time setup for your Microsoft Surface Hub, make sure you have all the information listed in this section.

segment.source: Setup worksheet (Surface Hub)
segment.target: Setup worksheet (Surface Hub)

segment.source: When you've finished pre-setup and are ready to start first-time setup for your Microsoft Surface Hub, make sure you have all the information listed in this section.
segment.target: When you've finished pre-setup and are ready to start first-time setup for your Microsoft Surface Hub, make sure you have all the information listed in this section.

segment.source: You should fill out one list for each Surface Hub you need to configure, although some information can be used on all Surface Hubs, like the proxy information or domain credentials.
segment.target: You should fill out one list for each Surface Hub you need to configure, although some information can be used on all Surface Hubs, like the proxy information or domain credentials.

segment.source: Some of this information may not be needed, depending on how you've decided to configure your device, or depending on how the environment is configured for your organization's infrastructure.
segment.target: Some of this information may not be needed, depending on how you've decided to configure your device, or depending on how the environment is configured for your organization's infrastructure.

segment.source: Property
segment.target: Property

segment.source: What this is used for
segment.target: What this is used for

segment.source: Example
segment.target: Example

segment.source: Actual value
segment.target: Actual value

segment.source: Proxy information
segment.target: Proxy information

segment.source: If your network uses a proxy to for network and/or Internet access, you must provide a script or server/port information.
segment.target: If your network uses a proxy to for network and/or Internet access, you must provide a script or server/port information.

segment.source: http://contoso/proxy.pa (proxy script) OR 10.10.10.100, port 8080 (server, port)
segment.target: http://contoso/proxy.pa (proxy script) OR 10.10.10.100, port 8080 (server, port)

segment.source: Wireless network credentials (username and password)
segment.target: Wireless network credentials (username and password)

segment.source: If you decide to connect your device to Wi-Fi, and your wireless network requires user credentials.
segment.target: If you decide to connect your device to Wi-Fi, and your wireless network requires user credentials.

segment.source: admin1@contoso.com, #MyPassw0rd
segment.target: admin1@contoso.com, #MyPassw0rd

segment.source: Device account UPN or Domain\username and device account password
segment.target: Device account UPN or Domain\username and device account password

segment.source: This is the User Principal Name (UPN) or the domain\username, and the password of the device account.
segment.target: This is the User Principal Name (UPN) or the domain\username, and the password of the device account.

segment.source: Mail, calendar, and Skype for Business depend on a compatible device account.
segment.target: Mail, calendar, and Skype for Business depend on a compatible device account.

segment.source: ConfRoom15@contoso.com, #Passw0rd1 (for UPN) OR CONTOSO\ConfRoom15, #Passw0rd1 (for Domain\username)
segment.target: ConfRoom15@contoso.com, #Passw0rd1 (for UPN) OR CONTOSO\ConfRoom15, #Passw0rd1 (for Domain\username)

segment.source: Device account Microsoft Exchange server
segment.target: Device account Microsoft Exchange server

segment.source: This is the device account's Exchange server.
segment.target: This is the device account's Exchange server.

segment.source: Mail, calendar, and Skype for Business depend on a compatible device account.
segment.target: Mail, calendar, and Skype for Business depend on a compatible device account.

segment.source: For mail and calendar to work, the device account must have a valid Exchange server.
segment.target: For mail and calendar to work, the device account must have a valid Exchange server.

segment.source: The device will try to find this automatically.
segment.target: The device will try to find this automatically.

segment.source: outlook.office365.com
segment.target: outlook.office365.com

segment.source: Device account Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) address
segment.target: Device account Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) address

segment.source: This is the device account's Skype for Business SIP address.
segment.target: This is the device account's Skype for Business SIP address.

segment.source: Mail, calendar, and Skype for Business depend on a compatible device account.
segment.target: Mail, calendar, and Skype for Business depend on a compatible device account.

segment.source: For Skype for Business to work, the device account must have a valid SIP address.
segment.target: For Skype for Business to work, the device account must have a valid SIP address.

segment.source: The device will try to find this automatically.
segment.target: The device will try to find this automatically.

segment.source: sip:ConfRoom15@contoso.com
segment.target: sip:ConfRoom15@contoso.com

segment.source: Friendly name
segment.target: Friendly name

segment.source: The friendly name of the device is the broadcast name that people will see when they try to wirelessly connect to the Surface Hub.
segment.target: The friendly name of the device is the broadcast name that people will see when they try to wirelessly connect to the Surface Hub.

segment.source: This name will be displayed prominently on the Surface Hub's screen.
segment.target: This name will be displayed prominently on the Surface Hub's screen.

segment.source: We suggest that the friendly name you choose is recognizable and unique so that people can distinguish one Surface Hub from another when trying to connect.
segment.target: We suggest that the friendly name you choose is recognizable and unique so that people can distinguish one Surface Hub from another when trying to connect.

segment.source: Conference Room 15
segment.target: Conference Room 15

segment.source: Device name
segment.target: Device name

segment.source: The device name is the name that will be used for domain join, and is the identity you will see in your MDM provider if the device is enrolled into MDM.
segment.target: The device name is the name that will be used for domain join, and is the identity you will see in your MDM provider if the device is enrolled into MDM.

segment.source: The device name you choose must not be the same name as any other device on the user’s Active Directory domain (if you decide to domain join the device).
segment.target: The device name you choose must not be the same name as any other device on the user’s Active Directory domain (if you decide to domain join the device).

segment.source: The device cannot join the domain if its name is not unique.
segment.target: The device cannot join the domain if its name is not unique.

segment.source: confroom15
segment.target: confroom15

segment.source: IF YOU'RE JOINING AZURE AD
segment.target: IF YOU'RE JOINING AZURE AD

segment.source: Azure AD tenant user credentials (username and password)
segment.target: Azure AD tenant user credentials (username and password)

segment.source: If you decide to have people in your Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) organization become admins on the device, then you'll need to join Azure AD.
segment.target: If you decide to have people in your Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) organization become admins on the device, then you'll need to join Azure AD.

segment.source: To join Azure AD, you will need valid user credentials.
segment.target: To join Azure AD, you will need valid user credentials.

segment.source: admin1@contoso.com, #MyPassw0rd
segment.target: admin1@contoso.com, #MyPassw0rd

segment.source: IF YOU'RE JOINING A DOMAIN
segment.target: IF YOU'RE JOINING A DOMAIN

segment.source: Domain to join
segment.target: Domain to join

segment.source: This is the domain you will need to join so that a security group of your choice can be admins for the device.
segment.target: This is the domain you will need to join so that a security group of your choice can be admins for the device.

segment.source: You may need the fully qualified domain name (FQDN).
segment.target: You may need the fully qualified domain name (FQDN).

segment.source: contoso (short name) OR contoso.corp.com (FQDN)
segment.target: contoso (short name) OR contoso.corp.com (FQDN)

segment.source: Domain account credentials (username and password)
segment.target: Domain account credentials (username and password)

segment.source: A domain can't be joined unless you provide sufficient account credentials to join the domain.
segment.target: A domain can't be joined unless you provide sufficient account credentials to join the domain.

segment.source: Once you provide a domain to join and credentials to join the domain, then a security group of your choice can change settings on the device.
segment.target: Once you provide a domain to join and credentials to join the domain, then a security group of your choice can change settings on the device.

segment.source: admin1, #MyPassw0rd
segment.target: admin1, #MyPassw0rd

segment.source: Admin security group alias
segment.target: Admin security group alias

segment.source: This is a security group in your Active Directory (AD); any members of this security group can change settings on the device.
segment.target: This is a security group in your Active Directory (AD); any members of this security group can change settings on the device.

segment.source: SurfaceHubAdmins
segment.target: SurfaceHubAdmins

segment.source: IF YOU'RE USING A LOCAL ADMIN
segment.target: IF YOU'RE USING A LOCAL ADMIN

segment.source: Local admin account credentials (username and password)
segment.target: Local admin account credentials (username and password)

segment.source: If you decide not to join an AD domain or Azure AD, you can create a local admin account on the device.
segment.target: If you decide not to join an AD domain or Azure AD, you can create a local admin account on the device.

segment.source: admin1, #MyPassw0rd
segment.target: admin1, #MyPassw0rd

segment.source: IF YOU NEED TO INSTALL CERTIFICATES OR APPS
segment.target: IF YOU NEED TO INSTALL CERTIFICATES OR APPS

segment.source: USB drive
segment.target: USB drive

segment.source: If you know before first run that you want to install certificates or universal apps, follow the steps in Create provisioning packages.
segment.target: If you know before first run that you want to install certificates or universal apps, follow the steps in Create provisioning packages.

segment.source: Your provisioning packages will be created on a USB drive.
segment.target: Your provisioning packages will be created on a USB drive.
